Title: 125: A Glimpse into the Virtual Reality World of the Future
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Co-Founder of the MMOne Project, Andrew Borisov. You will hear about the Out-of-Home VR Entertainment Market Landscape and the future of Virtual Reality, and learn about future trends, particularly moving to virtual worlds and job losses.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/125
